data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample BRUNOPGL-82

Exposition NW, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Granit u. Fluviogl. Podsol. , av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 70%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 70%, Moss cover 30%, Vegatation type: Feuchter Stand. mit Equisetum und Abies, Film number: 799A
